title: The Price of Power—A Cunning Farewell
subtitle: Power is a game with no finish line, only new challengers. You have glimpsed the dark machinery behind the throne—the manipulation, the calculation, the ruthless pursuit of dominance. Remember, there are no permanent friends or enemies, only interests. Thank you for walking the razor’s edge with us. The next event awaits—will you rule, or be ruled?

images.caption: A shadowy corridor lined with empty thrones, a single figure walking away into ominous glow.
